item.description:
[NEW FILMS ADDED]
The Wedeln Ski & Outdoor Club is proud to kick off the 08/09 season with a party and ski film festival at "The Place" in downtown Boston!!

Films include:
Rage Films "Such is Life"
Poor Boyz Productions "Reasons!"
"Eastern Boarder"
"Blurred" by Huckfest .

Cost is $10 with pre-sale or $15 at the door. Tickets will be onsale at the Wedeln Ski Club booth (e11) at the Ski & Snowboard Expo at the Bayside this weekend.

Many extras including free appetizers, door prizes and special guests. All proceeds will go to the Bragan Ski Scholarship. The Bragan Scholarship supports young ski racers from Mt Washington Valley. Come on out and meet Wedeln members, support a great cause and get ready for a the new season. This event is 21+, please bring your ID.

Check out these links below!
The Place - Boston

Trailer for Such is Life Video by ragefilms

Trailer for Reasons from poor boyz productions

Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club
item.name: Wedeln Ski Film Festival (and Party)
